name: Sparkling Blue Butterfly Iced Tea
preparation: Pour 3 cups boiling water over tea bags. Steep for 10 min. Remove tea bags and chill in refrigerator until cold, about 20 min.
In a pitcher, combine tea with sparkling water and lemon juice.
Pour over ice in tall glasses.
tips: Add 1 tbsp of honey while the tea is still hot for a sweeter, less tangy version.

products.name: Blue Butterfly Herbal Tea Blend (staples)
summary: A refreshing sipper that's mildly sweet with hint of grape and vibrant pea flowers.
